summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 6287 for the improvement of Northeast 110th St. from 5th Ave. Northeast to 15th Ave. Northeast; and certain other streets and avenues; by constructing watermains together with fire hydrants and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance 92291, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
